Description: Rim sherd of Chian Grand Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim (now lost), glazed black below; part of rosette in added white and added red and part of a lotus flower in white outline; exterior: short vertical strokes at rim above cross-hatched pattern between bands; below, painted decoration consisting of undetermined motif.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0780) (phase 2)
